moves.name: Absorb
moves.effect: The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

moves.name: Aromatherapy
moves.effect: Cures all status conditions for the user and its allies.

moves.name: Bullet Seed
moves.effect: Hits 2 to 5 times. Roll 1d4+1 to determine the number of hits.

moves.name: Cotton Guard
moves.effect: The user raises its Vitality by 3 for the rest of the scene. This move can only be used once per scene.

moves.name: Cotton Spore
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Insight is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Forest's Curse
moves.effect: Adds the Grass type to the target's current typing for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Frenzy Plant
moves.effect: The user cannot act on the next turn.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.effect: The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

moves.name: Grass Knot
moves.effect: Damage depends on the weight of the target.

moves.name: Grass Pledge
moves.effect: If used after Water Pledge, creates a swamp. If used before Fire Pledge, creates a sea of fire.

moves.name: Grassy Terrain
moves.effect: Creates a Grassy Terrain for 5 rounds. Pokémon on the ground are healed each turn and the power of Grass-type moves is boosted.

moves.name: Growth
moves.effect: Raises the user's Strength and Special by 1. In Sunny Weather, raises them by 2 instead.

moves.name: Horn Leech
moves.effect: The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.effect: The user plants roots, recovering 1d6 HP each turn but becoming unable to switch out or be forced to switch.

moves.name: Leaf Blade
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.effect: After use, the user's Special is lowered by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Leafage
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.effect: The target is seeded. At the end of each of its turns, the target loses 1d6 HP, and the user regains HP equal to the amount lost.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.effect: This move cannot miss.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.effect: The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

moves.name: Needle Arm
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Petal Blizzard
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

moves.name: Petal Dance
moves.effect: The user attacks for 2-3 turns, then becomes Confused.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.effect: The target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Power Whip
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Seed Bomb
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.effect: The target falls Asleep.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.effect: This move requires one full turn to charge. The user can act on the second turn. In Sunny Weather, this move does not require a charge turn.

moves.name: Spiky Shield
moves.effect: Protects the user from all effects. If hit by a physical move, the attacker takes damage.

moves.name: Spore
moves.effect: The target falls Asleep. This move has perfect accuracy.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.effect: The target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.effect: The user recovers HP. The amount depends on the weather (more in Sun, less in other weather).

moves.name: Trop Kick
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the target's Strength is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Vine Whip
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Wood Hammer
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to one-third of the damage it deals.

moves.name: Worry Seed
moves.effect: Changes the target's Ability to Insomnia for the rest of the scene.
